verses.verse: Then <S%H227><s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H7206>Reubenites,<s%> and the <S%H1425>Gadites,<s%> and the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%>

And <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H859>Ye<s%> have <S%H8104>kept<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you, and have <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> my <S%H6963>voice<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you:

Ye have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5800>left<s%> <S%H853><s%> your <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H2088>these<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> but have <S%H8104>kept<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

And <S%H6258>now<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> hath given <S%H5117>rest<s%> unto your <S%H251>brethren,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> he <S%H1696>promised<s%> them: therefore <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H6437>return<s%> ye, and <S%H1980>get<s%> you unto your <S%H168>tents,<s%> and <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H272>possession,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> you on the other <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>

But <S%H7535><s%> take <S%H3966>diligent<s%> <S%H8104>heed<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> and the <S%H8451>law,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>charged<s%> you, to <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and to <S%H1980>walk<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and to <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> and to <S%H1692>cleave<s%> unto him, and to <S%H5647>serve<s%> him with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3824>heart<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> them, and sent them <S%H7971>away:<s%> and they <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> their <S%H168>tents.<s%>

Now to the one <S%H2677>half<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had <S%H5414>given<s%> possession in <S%H1316>Bashan:<s%> but unto the other <S%H2677>half<s%> thereof <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5973>among<s%> their <S%H251>brethren<s%> on this <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H3220>westward.<s%> And <S%H3588>when<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> sent them <S%H7971>away<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> their <S%H168>tents,<s%> then he <S%H1288>blessed<s%> them,

And he <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7725>Return<s%> with <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H5233>riches<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> your <S%H168>tents,<s%> and with <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H4735>cattle,<s%> with <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and with <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and with <S%H5178>brass,<s%> and with <S%H1270>iron,<s%> and with <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7235>much<s%> <S%H8008>raiment:<s%> <S%H2505>divide<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> of your <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> your <S%H251>brethren.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H7725>returned,<s%> and <S%H1980>departed<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H854><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of <S%H4480>Shiloh,<s%> <S%H7887><s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> to <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H776>country<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H272>possession,<s%> <S%H834>whereof<s%> they were <S%H270>possessed,<s%> <S%H5921>according<s%> to the <S%H6310>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

And when they <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1552>borders<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> are in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%> to <S%H4758>see<s%> to.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> have <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H853><s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> over <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H4136><s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> <S%H413>in<s%> the <S%H1552>borders<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> <S%H413>at<s%> the <S%H1552>passage<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And when the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> of it, the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> gathered themselves <S%H6950>together<s%> at <S%H7887>Shiloh,<s%> to <S%H5927>go<s%> up to <S%H6635>war<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> and <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> and <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%>

And <S%H5973>with<s%> him <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H5387>princes,<s%> of each <S%H5387>chief<s%> <S%H259><s%> <S%H5387><s%> <S%H259><s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> a <S%H1>prince<s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4294>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and each <S%H376>one<s%> was a <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%> among the <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And they <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> and <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> and <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> and they <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> them, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H4604>trespass<s%> is <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> ye have <S%H4603>committed<s%> against the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to turn <S%H7725>away<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> from <S%H4480>following<s%> <S%H310><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> in that ye have <S%H1129>built<s%> you an <S%H4196>altar,<s%> that ye might <S%H4775>rebel<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD?<s%>

Is <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of <S%H6465>Peor<s%> too <S%H4592>little<s%> for us, <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> we are <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> although there <S%H1961>was<s%> a <S%H5063>plague<s%> in the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%>

But that <S%H859>ye<s%> must turn <S%H7725>away<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> from <S%H4480>following<s%> <S%H310><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD?<s%> and it will <S%H1961>be,<s%> seeing <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H4775>rebel<s%> <S%H3117>today<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that <S%H4279>tomorrow<s%> he will be <S%H7107>wroth<s%> <S%H413>with<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Notwithstanding, <S%H389><s%> <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H272>possession<s%> be <S%H2931>unclean,<s%> then pass ye <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H272>possession<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> <S%H7931>dwelleth,<s%> <S%H8033><s%> and take <S%H270>possession<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> us: but <S%H4775>rebel<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H408>nor<s%> <S%H4775>rebel<s%> against us, in <S%H1129>building<s%> you an <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H4480>beside<s%> <S%H1107><s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God.<s%>

Did <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5912>Achan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2226>Zerah<s%> <S%H4603>commit<s%> a <S%H4604>trespass<s%> in the accursed <S%H2764>thing,<s%> and <S%H7110>wrath<s%> <S%H1961>fell<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%> and <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1478>perished<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H259>alone<s%> in his <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>

Then the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H6030>answered,<s%> and <S%H1696>said<s%> <S%H853>unto<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H430>gods,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H430>gods,<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H3045>knoweth,<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> shall <S%H3045>know;<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> it be in <S%H4777>rebellion,<s%> or <S%H518>if<s%> in <S%H4604>transgression<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3467>(save<s%> us <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day,)<s%>

That we have <S%H1129>built<s%> us an <S%H4196>altar<s%> to <S%H7725>turn<s%> from <S%H4480>following<s%> <S%H310><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> or <S%H518>if<s%> to <S%H5927>offer<s%> <S%H5921>thereon<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> or meat <S%H4503>offering,<s%> or <S%H518>if<s%> to <S%H6213>offer<s%> <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H2077>offerings<s%> <S%H5921>thereon,<s%> let the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1931>himself<s%> <S%H1245>require<s%> it;

And <S%H518>if<s%> we have <S%H3808>not<s%> rather <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2063>it<s%> for <S%H4480>fear<s%> <S%H1674><s%> of this <S%H4480>thing,<s%> <S%H1697><s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> In time to <S%H4279>come<s%> your <S%H1121>children<s%> might <S%H559>speak<s%> unto our <S%H1121>children,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> have ye to do with the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%>

For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H5414>made<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> a <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> us and you, ye <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad;<s%> ye have <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2506>part<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> so shall your <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H853>make<s%> our <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H7673>cease<s%> from <S%H3372>fearing<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Therefore we <S%H559>said,<s%> Let us <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H6213>prepare<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H853>us<s%> an <S%H4196>altar,<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> for <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering, <S%H3808>nor<s%> for sacrifice: <S%H2077><s%>

But <S%H3588><s%> that <S%H1931>it<s%> may be a <S%H5707>witness<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> us, and you, and our <S%H1755>generations<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> us, that we might <S%H5647>do<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him with our burnt <S%H5930>offerings,<s%> and with our <S%H2077>sacrifices,<s%> and with our peace <S%H8002>offerings;<s%> that your <S%H1121>children<s%> may <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> to our <S%H1121>children<s%> in time to <S%H4279>come,<s%> Ye have <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2506>part<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Therefore <S%H559>said<s%> we, that it shall <S%H1961>be,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> they should so <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> us or <S%H413>to<s%> our <S%H1755>generations<s%> in time to <S%H4279>come,<s%> that we may <S%H559>say<s%> again, <S%H7200>Behold<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8403>pattern<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> our <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H6213>made,<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> for burnt <S%H5930>offerings,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> for <S%H2077>sacrifices;<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is a <S%H5707>witness<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> us and you.

God <S%H2486>forbid<s%> that <S%H4480>we<s%> should <S%H4775>rebel<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H7725>turn<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> from <S%H4480>following<s%> <S%H310><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> for burnt <S%H5930>offerings,<s%> for meat <S%H4503>offerings,<s%> or for <S%H2077>sacrifices,<s%> <S%H4480>beside<s%> <S%H905><s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H4908>tabernacle.<s%>

And when <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> and <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were <S%H854>with<s%> him, <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke,<s%> it <S%H3190>pleased<s%> <S%H5869><s%> them.
